page.title: 19GAMES CHILREN PLAY
page.content: Nowadays older children don't play as many games as they would have done in the past.Some favourite games of younger children are skipping, kiss-chase and hopscotch. Older children in their spare time go to youth clubs,discos and other organisations,but if they don't go out they mostly spend their time watching T.V.,listening to records or tapes of popular music or listening to the radio.Girls in their spare time sometimes read magazines,go to the town or meet friends.Boys like playing cricket, football, fishing, bike riding and break-dancing.Break-dancing originally came from America and is a form of energetic disco dance/gymnast- ics.Many children have their own small computer and spend much time playing computer games.
